statements: SELECT * FROM drip_email_campaigns ORDER BY campaign_name DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date FROM drip_email_campaigns WHERE start_date = '2021-10-25';
SELECT campaign_name, schedule_time FROM drip_email_campaigns WHERE campaign_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM drip_email_campaigns WHERE customer_behavior_trigger IS NOT NULL;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, schedule_time FROM drip_email_campaigns ORDER BY start_date ASC, schedule_time DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date FROM drip_email_campaigns WHERE campaign_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM drip_email_campaigns WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY schedule_time DESC;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name FROM drip_email_campaigns WHERE customer_behavior_trigger = 'purchase' ORDER BY campaign_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_campaigns FROM drip_email_campaigns;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, customer_behavior_trigger FROM drip_email_campaigns WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM customers WHERE last_activity >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM customers ORDER BY last_activity DESC;
SELECT * FROM email_campaigns;
SELECT campaign_name, trigger_event, send_date FROM email_campaigns WHERE send_date <= NOW();
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email_address FROM customers WHERE last_activity > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email_address FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE '%Smith%' AND email_address LIKE '%gmail.com%' ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers JOIN email_campaigns ON customers.customer_id = email_campaigns.customer_id WHERE send_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email_address FROM customers WHERE customer_name = 'John Doe' OR customer_name = 'Jane Doe';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email_address FROM customers WHERE last_activity < '2022-05-01' AND last_activity > '2022-04-01' ORDER BY last_activity DESC;
SELECT * FROM leads;
SELECT lead_name, email FROM leads WHERE behavior_trigger = 'signup';
SELECT lead_id, email, behavior_trigger FROM leads WHERE lead_name LIKE 'John%';
SELECT * FROM email_templates ORDER BY template_name DESC;
SELECT lead_id, template_name, send_date FROM campaign_history WHERE campaign_id = 101;
SELECT * FROM leads WHERE lead_name = 'John Smith';
SELECT * FROM email_templates WHERE LENGTH(content) > 100;
SELECT lead_name, email FROM leads WHERE behavior_trigger IS NOT NULL ORDER BY lead_id DESC;
SELECT template_name, content FROM email_templates WHERE template_id IN (1,3,5) ORDER BY template_id ASC;
SELECT lead_name, send_date FROM leads l JOIN campaign_history ch ON l.lead_id = ch.lead_id ORDER BY send_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT name, last_activity FROM customers WHERE last_activity > '2021-01-01';
SELECT campaign_name, campaign_content FROM email_campaigns WHERE send_date = '2022-05-15';
SELECT lead_source, created_at FROM leads ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE last_activity < '2022-01-01';
SELECT customers.name, leads.lead_source FROM customers JOIN leads ON customers.customer_id = leads.customer_id;
SELECT email_campaigns.campaign_name, email_campaigns.send_date FROM email_campaigns WHERE send_date > '2021-12-01';
SELECT behavior_triggers.trigger_type, behavior_triggers.trigger_date FROM behavior_triggers ORDER BY trigger_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT behavior_id, lead_id, behavior_type FROM lead_behavior WHERE behavior_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT template_id, template_name FROM email_templates WHERE LENGTH(template_content) > 100;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM drip_campaigns WHERE active = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE last_activity_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT behavior_type, behavior_date FROM lead_behavior WHERE behavior_date >= '2021-05-01' ORDER BY behavior_date DESC;
SELECT template_name FROM email_templates WHERE LENGTH(template_content) > 100;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM drip_campaigns WHERE active = true ORDER BY start_date ASC;
